00063     def writeSimple(self):
00064         '''writes out cartesian coordinates for all atoms'''
00065         self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines = self.ii.coordinateFormat+' '+str(len(self.atomsatoms))+linesep
00066         for atom in self.atomsatoms:
00067                 self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines+=atom[0]+' '+str(atom[1])+' '+str(atom[2])+' '+str(atom[3])+linesep
00068         return self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines
00069     
00070     def writePartialCharges(self):
00071         '''writes out cartesian coordinates for all atoms'''
00072         self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines = self.ii.coordinateFormat+' '+str(len(self.atomsatoms))+linesep
00073         for atom in self.atomsatoms:
00074             self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines+=atom[0]+' '+str(atom[1])+' '+str(atom[2])+' '\
00075                     +str(atom[3])+' '+str(self.partialChargespartialCharges[atom[0]])+linesep
00076         return self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines
00077     
00078     
00079     def writeFitting(self):
00080         '''writes out cartesian coordinates for all atoms'''
00081         self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines = self.ii.coordinateFormat+' '+str(len(self.atomsatoms))+linesep
00082         firstAtom=self.atomsatoms[0]
00083         for atom in self.atomsatoms:
00084             self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines+=atom[0]+' '+str(atom[1])+' '+str(atom[2])+' '\
00085                 +str(atom[3])+' '+str(self.partialChargespartialCharges[atom[0]])+' '
00086             if atom==firstAtom:
00087                 self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines+='0 0 0'+linesep
00088             else:
00089                 self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines+='1 1 1'+linesep
00090         return self.coordinateLinescoordinateLines
